articles.title: The Iranian sports stars being arrested, jailed and executed as anti-government protests continue
articles.description: Human rights organisations say the regime is trying to "make an example" of Iran's athletes as demonstrations over the death of Mahsa Amini in police custody continue to rage across the country.
articles.content:
Iranian sports stars have been arrested, sentenced to death and executed as authorities continue to brutally clamp down on protests.
Human rights organisations say the regime is trying to "make an example" of athletes, some of whom have taken part in... [5578 chars]

articles.title: Certain type of glial cell plays a major role in spatial learning
articles.description: There are two fundamentally different cell types in the brain, neurons and glial cells. The latter, for example, insulate the "wiring" of nerve cells or guarantee optimal working conditions for them.
articles.content: There are two fundamentally different cell types in the brain, neurons and glial cells. The latter, for example, insulate the "wiring" of nerve cells or guarantee optimal working conditions for them. A new study led by the University of Bonn has now ... [5115 chars]

articles.title: Olam’s Saudi-Singapore IPO sign of shifting times
articles.description: Signs of deepening ties between Asia and the oil-rich Gulf are coming thick and fast. A planned Saudi Arabia-Singapore dual listing this year for Olam Agri, a trader of grains and seeds, is the latest example.
articles.content: MUMBAI, Jan 11 (Reuters Breakingviews) - Signs of deepening ties between Asia and the oil-rich Gulf are coming thick and fast. A planned Saudi Arabia-Singapore dual listing this year for Olam Agri, a trader of grains and seeds, is the latest example.... [1826 chars]

articles.description: This is "an inspirational example of how the world can come together to address global challenges."

articles.content:

articles.title: 30 years on, Czechoslovakia's 'velvet divorce' is not a model for Scottish independence from the UK
articles.description: Despite hopes of a second referendum on independence being dashed, many Scottish nationalists look to Slovakia as an example of how a small nation can stand on its own.
articles.content: Had Scottish nationalists got their way, 2023 would have seen the country head to the polls in a second referendum over independence from the United Kingdom – and they might have won. Whereas the first attempt in 2014 resulted in 55% voting “no,” pol... [7618 chars]

articles.title: Can the new Alzheimer’s drug, Lecanemab, be effective enough?
articles.description: ‘There are various scales for measuring cognitive decline. A good example would be a patient, who is soiling, starting to tell the caregivers that they need to go to the bathroom. And in this context, the medicine approved now has an edge over the previous one,’ says Dr MV Padma Shrivastava, head of the neurosciences centre at AIIMS

articles.title: Gunmen kidnap 32 people from southern Nigeria train station
articles.description: The attack is the latest example of the growing insecurity that has spread to nearly every corner of Africa's most populous country, posing a challenge to the government in advance of a February presidential election.
articles.content:
Gunmen armed with AK-47 rifles have abducted more than 30 people from a train station in Nigeria’s southern Edo state, the governor’s office said on Sunday.
The attack is the latest example of the growing insecurity that has spread to nearly every co... [1533 chars]
